posts.post_content:
This guy infiltrated his way onto a dating site, and got rejected by some girl for playing Magic. Poor man. He's better off without her.  
  
I guess she wants to marry for love, rather than the gobs of money Finkel gets from the hedge fund he manages. Maybe she wanted someone with a more [winning smile.](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Psychatog)  
Also, the card is awesome.
